commands.name: az monitor data-collection rule log-analytics add
commands.summary: Add Log Analytics destinations of a data collection rule.
commands.syntax:
az monitor data-collection rule log-analytics add --data-collection-rule-name
                                                  --name
                                                  --resource-group
                                                  [--resource-id]
examples: az monitor data-collection rule log-analytics add --rule-name myCollectionRule --resource-group myResourceGroup --name workspace2 --resource-id /subscriptions/703362b3-f2784e4b-9179-c76eaf41ffc2/resourceGroups/myResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/workspace2

commands.name: az monitor data-collection rule log-analytics delete
commands.summary: Delete a Log Analytics destinations of a data collection rule.
commands.syntax:
az monitor data-collection rule log-analytics delete --data-collection-rule-name
                                                     --name
                                                     --resource-group
examples: az monitor data-collection rule log-analytics delete --rule-name myCollectionRule --resource-group myResourceGroup --name workspace2

commands.name: az monitor data-collection rule log-analytics list
commands.summary: List Log Analytics destinations of a data collection rule.
commands.syntax:
az monitor data-collection rule log-analytics list --data-collection-rule-name
                                                   --resource-group
examples: az monitor data-collection rule log-analytics list --rule-name myCollectionRule --resource-group myResourceGroup

commands.name: az monitor data-collection rule log-analytics show
commands.summary: Show a Log Analytics destination of a data collection rule.
commands.syntax:
az monitor data-collection rule log-analytics show --data-collection-rule-name
                                                   --name
                                                   --resource-group
examples: az monitor data-collection rule log-analytics show --rule-name myCollectionRule --resource-group myResourceGroup --name centralWorkspace

commands.name: az monitor data-collection rule log-analytics update
commands.summary: Update a Log Analytics destination of a data collection rule.
commands.syntax:
az monitor data-collection rule log-analytics update --data-collection-rule-name
                                                     --name
                                                     --resource-group
                                                     [--add]
                                                     [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                     [--remove]
                                                     [--resource-id]
                                                     [--set]
examples: az monitor data-collection rule log-analytics update --rule-name myCollectionRule --resource-group myResourceGroup --name workspace2 --resource-id "/subscriptions/703362b3-f278-4e4b-9179-c76eaf41ffc2/resourceGroups/myResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/anotherWorkspace"
